law.catch_line: Compensation of board -- Limitation on days of session.
law.text: Except as provided in KRS 18A.200, members of the board shall receive fifty dollars ($50) per day and actual traveling expenses while attending meetings of the board, but the total number of days the board may be in session shall not exceed thirty-six (36) per year.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 122, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 27, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 122, sec. 2, effective March 25, 1960. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 37-12.
